abbreviation.ToolTip: Abbreviation or code representing the country.

agriculturallandpct.ToolTip: Percentage of land area used for agricultural purposes.

armedforcessize.ToolTip: Size of the armed forces in the country.

birthrate.ToolTip: Number of births per 1,000 population per year.

callingcode.ToolTip: International calling code for the country.

capitalcity.ToolTip: Name of the capital or major city.

coastlinedistance.ToolTip: Total distance of country boundary that touches coastline, in km.

cpi.ToolTip: Consumer Price Index, a measure of inflation and purchasing power.

currencycode.ToolTip: Currency code used in the country.

deathrateperthousand.ToolTip: The number of deaths per 1,000 population per year.

density.ToolTip: Population density measured in persons per square kilometer.

exportpartners.ToolTip: Top 3 countries or entities with which the country engages in significant export trade.

fertilityrate.ToolTip: Average number of children born to a woman during her lifetime.

forestedareapct.ToolTip: Percentage of land area covered by forests.

gasolineprice.ToolTip: Price of gasoline per liter in local currency.

gdp.ToolTip: Gross Domestic Product, the total value of goods and services produced in the country.

gdppercapita.ToolTip: Gross Domestic Product (GDP) per capita, which represents the average wealth per person in the country.

highestelevation.ToolTip: The highest point in the country, usually measured in meters above sea level.

infantmortality.ToolTip: Number of deaths per 1,000 live births before reaching one year of age.

internetcountrycode.ToolTip: The two-letter country code used in internet domain names governed by the country.

internetuserspct.ToolTip: Percentage of the country's population that uses the internet.

landarea.ToolTip: Total land area of the country in square kilometers.

landlocked.ToolTip: Indicates whether the country is entirely surrounded by land and has no coastline.

largestcity.ToolTip: Name of the country's largest city.

latitude.ToolTip: Latitude coordinate of the country's location.

lifeexpectancy.ToolTip: Average number of years a newborn is expected to live.

literacypct.ToolTip: Percentage of the population aged 15 and over who can read and write.

longitude.ToolTip: Longitude coordinate of the country's location.}

maternalmortalityratio.ToolTip: Number of maternal deaths per 100,000 live births.

medianage.ToolTip: The age that divides the population into two numerically equal groups, with half being younger and half older.

minimumwage.ToolTip: Minimum wage level in local currency.

mostpopularreligion.ToolTip: The dominant religion or faith tradition practiced in the country.

obesity.ToolTip: Percentage of the population that is considered obese.

officiallanguage.ToolTip: Official language(s) spoken in the country.

outofpockethealthexpenditure.ToolTip: Percentage of total health expenditure paid out-of-pocket by individuals.

physiciansperthousand.ToolTip: Number of physicians per thousand people.

populationbelowpovertyline.ToolTip: Percentage of the population living below the poverty line.

populationlaborforcepct.ToolTip: Percentage of the population that is part of the labor force.

primaryeducationenrollmentratio.ToolTip: Gross enrollment ratio for primary education, per one thousand persons.

randombordercountry.ToolTip: A neighboring country that shares a border with the country, selected randomly.

taxrevenuepct.ToolTip: Tax revenue as a percentage of GDP.

totalexports.ToolTip: Total value of goods and services exported by the country in a given period.

totaltaxrate.ToolTip: Overall tax burden as a percentage of commercial profits.

unemploymentrate.ToolTip: Percentage of the labor force that is unemployed.

urbanpopulation.ToolTip: Percentage of the population living in urban areas.
